results.title: Metformin inhibits inflammation and bone destruction in collagen-induced arthritis in rats
results.text_hl: Our study showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ can inhibit @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@systemic inflammation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Synovitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013585 @@@synovitis@@@ and plays a role in bone protection by inhibiting cartilage layer matrix degradation, osteoclast formation, and chondrocyte apoptosis.

citations.NLM: Fan KJ, Wu J, Wang QS, Xu BX, Zhao FT, Wang TY. Metformin inhibits inflammation and bone destruction in collagen-induced arthritis in rats Ann Transl Med. 2020 Dec;8(23):1565. PMID: 33437764
citations.BibTeX: @article{33437764, title={Metformin inhibits inflammation and bone destruction in collagen-induced arthritis in rats}, author={Fan KJ and Wu J and Wang QS and Xu BX and Zhao FT and Wang TY}, journal={Ann Transl Med}, volume={8}, number={23}, pages={1565}}

results.title: Metformin Attenuates the Inflammatory Response via the Regulation of Synovial M1 Macrophage in Osteoarthritis
results.text_hl: Our study uncovered the protective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in treating @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@ in the way of anti-@<m>DISEASE_Synovitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013585 @@@synovitis@@@ in macrophages.

citations.NLM: Zheng M, Zhu Y, Wei K, Pu H, Peng R, Xiao J, Liu C, Sun X. Metformin Attenuates the Inflammatory Response via the Regulation of Synovial M1 Macrophage in Osteoarthritis Int J Mol Sci. 2023 Mar 10;24(6):. PMID: 36982442
citations.BibTeX: @article{36982442, title={Metformin Attenuates the Inflammatory Response via the Regulation of Synovial M1 Macrophage in Osteoarthritis}, author={Zheng M and Zhu Y and Wei K and Pu H and Peng R and Xiao J and Liu C and Sun X}, journal={Int J Mol Sci}, volume={24}, number={6}}

results.title: Metformin attenuates osteoarthritis by targeting chondrocytes, synovial macrophages and adipocytes.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ showed protective effects on @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@, characterized by reductions on OARSI score [2.00, 95% CI (1.15, 2.86) for ND @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and 3.17, 95% CI (2.37, 3.96) for HFD @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@] and @<m>DISEASE_Synovitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013585 @@@synovitis@@@ score [1.17, 95% CI (0.27, 2.06) for ND @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and 2.50, 95% CI (1.49, 3.51) for HFD @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@] after 10 weeks of treatment, and the effects were more significant in HFD @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ than in ND @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Li D, Ruan G, Zhang Y, Zhao Y, Zhu Z, Ou Q, Huang H, Chen J, Han W, Tang S, Li J, Wang L, Chen T, Bai X, Cai D, Ding C. Metformin attenuates osteoarthritis by targeting chondrocytes, synovial macrophages and adipocytes. Rheumatology (Oxford). 2022 Aug 19;():. PMID: 35984286
citations.BibTeX: @article{35984286, title={Metformin attenuates osteoarthritis by targeting chondrocytes, synovial macrophages and adipocytes.}, author={Li D and Ruan G and Zhang Y and Zhao Y and Zhu Z and Ou Q and Huang H and Chen J and Han W and Tang S and Li J and Wang L and Chen T and Bai X and Cai D and Ding C}, journal={Rheumatology (Oxford)}}

results.title: Metformin Alleviates Radiation-Induced Skin Fibrosis via the Downregulation of FOXO3.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: The oral administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly reduced radiation-induced @<m>DISEASE_Synovitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013585 @@@skin thickening@@@ and collagen accumulation and significantly reduced the radiation-induced expression of @GENE_FOXO3 @GENE_56484 @@@FOXO3@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ skin.

citations.NLM: Kim JM, Yoo H, Kim JY, Oh SH, Kang JW, Yoo BR, Han SY, Kim CS, Choi WH, Lee EJ, Byeon HJ, Lee WJ, Lee YS, Cho J. Metformin Alleviates Radiation-Induced Skin Fibrosis via the Downregulation of FOXO3. Cell Physiol Biochem. 2018;48(3):959-970. PMID: 30036874
citations.BibTeX: @article{30036874, title={Metformin Alleviates Radiation-Induced Skin Fibrosis via the Downregulation of FOXO3.}, author={Kim JM and Yoo H and Kim JY and Oh SH and Kang JW and Yoo BR and Han SY and Kim CS and Choi WH and Lee EJ and Byeon HJ and Lee WJ and Lee YS and Cho J}, journal={Cell Physiol Biochem}, volume={48}, number={3}, pages={959-970}}
